name: toRuntime
signature: <RIn, E, ROut>(self: Layer<ROut, E, RIn>) => Effect<Runtime<ROut>, E, Scope | RIn>
description:
Converts a layer that requires no services into a scoped runtime, which can
be used to execute effects.
documentation:
Converts a layer that requires no services into a scoped runtime, which can
be used to execute effects.
